chapters.title: Shipwreck
chapters.description: Washed ashore in a foreign land

tutorial_intro.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_intro.text: Hey! Hey! Time for your daily lesson!

tutorial_intro.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_intro.text: I know, I know - you're busy. But trust me, just a few minutes a day and you'll be speaking like a local in no time!

tutorial_intro.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_intro.text: We'll start with something safe. A simulation - predictable conversations, no pressure.

tutorial_intro.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_intro.text: I'll put you in a cozy ramen shop. Simple stuff - ordering food, being polite.

tutorial_intro.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_intro.text: Oh! And don't worry - I can freeze time whenever you need to think. Pretty cool, right?

tutorial_intro.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_intro.text: Just focus on the sounds, the rhythm. You've got this!

tutorial_to_story.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_to_story.text: See? You're getting it. The textbook way works.

tutorial_to_story.speaker: player
tutorial_to_story.text: This feels... artificial. Like a simulation.

tutorial_to_story.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_to_story.text: Because it is. That's how everyone learns now.

tutorial_to_story.speaker: player
tutorial_to_story.text: I want the real thing. Put me somewhere I can't just restart.

tutorial_to_story.speaker: bimbo
tutorial_to_story.text: You sure about that? I have something. But it's not safe.

shogun_intro.speaker: bimbo
shogun_intro.text: Warlords fighting for control. Samurai who kill first and ask questions never.

shogun_intro.speaker: bimbo
shogun_intro.text: You'll be an Englishman. Shipwrecked on a foreign shore. No Japanese, no allies, no idea what's happening.

shogun_intro.speaker: bimbo
shogun_intro.text: I can still freeze time for you - that's my gift. But when time flows... you're on your own.

shogun_intro.speaker: bimbo
shogun_intro.text: One wrong word could mean your head.

awakening.speaker: narration
awakening.text: Your eyes open. Salt water. Splinters. Chaos.

awakening.speaker: narration
awakening.text: The storm has passed. You're alive - barely.

awakening.speaker: narration
awakening.text: Rough hands grab you. Drag you to your feet.

awakening.speaker: bimbo
awakening.text: Steady. He's asking who you are.

awakening.speaker: narration
awakening.text: A blade gleams in the torchlight.

awakening.speaker: bimbo
awakening.text: Time to freeze. Let me help you.

time_freeze_lesson.speaker: bimbo
time_freeze_lesson.text: There. Bought you some time. Literally.

time_freeze_lesson.speaker: bimbo
time_freeze_lesson.text: He wants to know who you are. Wrong answer and that blade finds your neck.

time_freeze_lesson.speaker: bimbo
time_freeze_lesson.text: Tap the phrase. Listen. Then say it back to me.

first_success.speaker: narration
first_success.text: The samurai's eyes widen. The blade lowers - slightly.

first_success.speaker: bimbo
first_success.text: You're alive. And your Japanese? Not bad for a first try.

first_success.speaker: bimbo
first_success.text: Welcome to Japan. The hard part starts now.

ship_interior.scene_description: Sleek futuristic spaceship interior, deep blue ambient lighting, holographic displays floating in air, viewport showing distant nebula and stars, clean minimalist surfaces with neon edge lighting

ship_viewport.scene_description: Wide cinematic view through massive spaceship window, galaxy and stars beyond, subtle grid pattern overlay at edges, neon purple and cyan accent lighting reflecting on glass

bimbo_orb_excited.scene_description: Glowing AI companion orb floating in dark space, vibrant purple and violet core with cyan particle trails, pulsing with excited energy, friendly warm glow emanating outward

bimbo_orb_explaining.scene_description: AI orb companion projecting holographic tutorial elements, soft purple glow, data streams and symbols floating around it, patient teacher presence

bimbo_orb_concerned.scene_description: AI orb companion with dimmer glow, slight flicker, worried energy pattern, purple core with unstable edges, hesitant body language

simulation_loading.scene_description: Holographic environment materializing, grid lines forming into shapes, neon blue wireframe becoming solid, digital particles coalescing into reality

ramen_holo.scene_description: Cozy ramen stall rendered in holographic style, warm lantern glow with subtle scan-lines, steam rising with particle effects, slight transparency revealing grid beneath, safe simulation feel

ramen_holo_wide.scene_description: Wide shot of holographic Tokyo street at night, neon signs with digital shimmer, pedestrians with slight transparency, cozy ramen stalls lining the alley, simulation aesthetic

hologram_japan_map.scene_description: Massive holographic projection of feudal Japan map, glowing territorial boundaries, castle icons pulsing, samurai silhouettes moving like chess pieces, purple and gold color scheme

hologram_samurai.scene_description: Holographic projection of fierce samurai warrior, translucent blue figure with glowing edges, katana raised, intensity visible despite digital form, historical footage playback feel

hologram_sengoku.scene_description: Holographic battle scene from Sengoku period, armies clashing in blue-purple projection, castles burning, chaos and warfare rendered in clean digital lines

simulation_glitch.scene_description: Holographic environment destabilizing, glitch artifacts, scan-lines intensifying, colors fragmenting, reality breaking apart into data streams

time_vortex.scene_description: Swirling temporal vortex, purple and cyan energy spiraling inward, clock fragments and Japanese characters floating in the stream, disorienting descent into the past

drop_flash.scene_description: Blinding white flash transitioning to temporal energy, last glimpse of ship interior dissolving, overwhelming light consuming everything

beach_storm.scene_description: Stormy beach at night, shipwreck debris scattered on dark sand, rain lashing down, crashing waves illuminated by lightning, desperate survival atmosphere

beach_wakeup.scene_description: POV shot opening eyes on beach, blurred vision clearing, salt water and splinters visible, rough sand beneath, disoriented first-person perspective

rough_hands.scene_description: Close-up of rough calloused hands grabbing wet clothing, torchlight flickering on weathered skin, aggressive grip pulling upward

samurai_face.scene_description: Samurai face extreme close-up, rain-soaked topknot, suspicious narrowed eyes, torchlight casting harsh shadows, interrogating stare

samurai_full.scene_description: Full body shot of samurai warrior on stormy beach, traditional armor gleaming wet, hand on katana hilt, imposing silhouette against lightning sky

blade_threat.scene_description: Katana blade extreme close-up pointed at viewer, razor edge gleaming in torchlight, rain drops on steel, life-or-death tension

blade_draw.scene_description: Dynamic shot of katana being drawn from scabbard, steel singing, torchlight catching the blade, motion blur of deadly intent

time_frozen.scene_description: Beach scene frozen in time, rain drops suspended mid-air, samurai frozen mid-motion, desaturated colors with purple temporal glow at edges, eerie stillness

time_frozen_blade.scene_description: Frozen katana blade inches from throat, suspended rain drops around it, purple time-stop glow, moment of death paused

bimbo_orb_battlefield.scene_description: Warm purple AI orb glowing in frozen beach scene, only source of color and movement, reassuring presence amid danger, particles swirling around it

samurai_surprised.scene_description: Samurai face showing surprise, eyes widening, blade lowering slightly, rain resuming around him, grudging respect dawning

beach_dawn.scene_description: Beach scene with storm clearing, first light of dawn on horizon, shipwreck in background, sense of survival and new beginning

restaurant.scene_description: Cozy ramen stall in Tokyo at night, warm lantern light, steam rising
